trans-unit.source: Represents the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) <xref uid="langword_csharp_anyAttribute" name="anyAttribute" href=""></xref> element.
The `anyAttribute` element enables any attribute from the specified namespace or namespaces to appear in the containing `complexType` element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnyAttribute"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the namespaces containing the attributes that can be used.
If no namespace is specified, `##any` is the default.
If the namespace is specified, it must be one of the values shown in the following table.

|Namespace value|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`##any`|Elements from any namespace can be present.| |`##other`|Elements from any namespace that is not the `targetNamespace` of the parent element containing the `anyAttribute` element can be present.| |`##local`|Elements that are not qualified with a namespace can be present.| |`##targetNamespace`|Elements from the `targetNamespace` of the parent element containing the `anyAttribute` element can be present.| |`List of {URIs,` `##targetNamespace, ##local}`|Elements from a space-delimited list of namespaces can be present.
The list can contain the following: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) references of namespaces, `##targetNamespace`, and `##local`.|
Namespaces for attributes that are available for use.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_##any" name="##any" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets information about how an application or XML processor should handle the validation of XML documents for the attributes specified by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_anyAttribute" name="anyAttribute" href=""></xref> element.
If no <xref uid="langword_csharp_processContents" name="processContents" href=""></xref> attribute is specified, the default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Strict" name="Strict" href=""></xref>.
